content.div:
Well, that didn't take long! Katy Perry may have already moved on from ex-hubby Russell Brand to the world's highest paid male model, Baptiste Giabiconi. Can you say upgrade?

According to the UK's The Sun, the pair were inseparable when they were spotted at hotel in Paris, where the singer is in town for Fashion Week.

According to the paper, Perry was all smiles and brushed hands with the male model, who stayed by her side the entire time. An onlooker said: "They were with a group of people, but they looked very much like a couple in love.

But are they a couple in love? Possibly! Just last year, the 22-year-old model said of the blue-haired beauty, 27, "If I could make her divorce her husband, I'd marry her."

The onlooker gushed, "He was never more than a foot away from her and they were very flirty. There was a lot of whispering, shared jokes and they were really flirting. They made a very good-looking couple."

While Perry is currently flirting her way through France, her soon-to-be ex-husband was spotted buying ridiculous hats in New Orleans. Katy Perry: 1. Russell Brand: 0.
